name: Mohit
p1_desc: Yaar Cs ke subjects barbaad hai kaafi. Kuch kaam aate Nahi Kahi. Mera toh bas ppo lag Jaye fer sabse kahunga bhaad me jaao- Words to live by. Thank you for all the help regarding coursework and any doubts that we had. Competitive coding ke gawd and uber me phod phad intern. We will always remember you bhaiya!
p2_desc: ICPC me everyone wanted you as a partner because aapka partner hona means ICPC to nikal hi gaya!
shortText2: He is the guy who used to solve all problems before a midsem or compre.
